Reviews.Title: HP Slate 7 tablet
Reviews.Author: Char
Reviews.Content: Great for the money ,beats audio speaker not all that til u use ear buds or other. I'm.  A HP fan so of course I'm happy with. will be shopping soon for a sprinter to go. With. Got the HP cover for the slate.....I'm lookin and feeling cute!▶▶◀

Reviews.Title: Gifts
Reviews.Author: hollywooddiva
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift to my grandaughter for her birthday/Christmas gift. I've given each one of my children and grandchildren one. They love it.

Reviews.Title: It's good but freezez up alot
Reviews.Author: April Colon-Pagan
Reviews.Content: Very good product, runs excellent with the exception of freezing up a lot & having to re-boot often.  Otherwise, it's a good product for the price

Reviews.Title: Charging and start up are not working properly
Reviews.Author: Amanda Geistfeld
Reviews.Content: The charging is a little touchy. It would not work plugged into a apple wall charging plug, it would not charge on one of the two PC computers we had and it started up very slowly. Once I got it charged and turned on a few times it started to work ok. We are still watching it to make sure it's going to continue to work properly.

Reviews.Title: The best HP
Reviews.Author: Rene Alfonso Munoz
Reviews.Content: This is one excelent Tablet.  MY CHILDREN play all the time an it is working excellent. Hp give excellent support for all goods. THANK YOU

Reviews.Title: Great device with a very fast and durable system-In my mind, beats the other competitors
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "hamed206"
Reviews.Content: I bought this device for two things: using the android applications & reading Amazon Kindle books. Its really a great device for these purposes.The system  never hangs and working fast. The device has a reasonable price compared to its specifications. In my mind, it beats the other famous brands like Samsung.Samsung tablets and mobiles hang a lot. But HP have made this device really perfect.The only thing in this device is that it has no 3G option. I use the internet too much, but I have solved this issue by buying a Huawei wifi 3G router which convert 3G to wifi. The HP wifi is really working nice and fast. I have no problems here. Thanks to HP.

Reviews.Title: HP Slate
Reviews.Author: Carrie
Reviews.Content: Slate arrived quickly and was in perfect shape.  The slate is perfect for my 9 year old boy with autism.  There are programs that can be downloaded on slate to help him with communication skills.  The slate is user friendly and once again, a good, reliable HP product.  Comparably, the price is unbeatable.

Reviews.Title: Runs very fast and very good for watching video and surfing in internet
Reviews.Author: ibrahima tall
Reviews.Content: i love it. it runs good, Very good when i surf in internet and watching video. The processor runs fast

Reviews.Title: HP slate 7 would not support file transfer through the micro usb port
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I wanted a tablet to transfer and preview high quality photographs from my digital SLR.  I was surprised to find out that the micro USB port is only useful for charging the tablet.  My micro usb sd card adapter would not work (spoke with HP technical support this function is not supported in the slate).  My digital camera uses SD cards, so I purchased a micro SD card with the adapter.  After trying this out, I decided that it would not be practical to view my photographs using the micro sd card.  Reason - I would be constantly taking the micro sd card out of the adapter in the camera, then placing the micro sd card in the tablet. Micro sd cards are extremely fragile, in fact the one I bought was damaged the first time I put it in the adapter.

Reviews.Title: Go Samsung
Reviews.Author: howdydoo
Reviews.Content: I purchased this device for my 14 year old son and after 2 weeks the power input literally came apart. Cheap parts and HP won't even cover it under warranty. Customer service wanted another 100.00 to fix. I used to like HP I've had laptops printers and now a tablet all Junk! Do yourself a favor and go with a Samsung product.

Reviews.Title: Great Product I really recomment it...
Reviews.Author: Patricia G.
Reviews.Content: It's great, high speed procesor, easy to use with 8 GB to store and the touch screen is very sencitive.

Reviews.Title: i got 99 pros and a con just 1
Reviews.Author: Eugene
Reviews.Content: Great seven inch for anyone who wants an inexpensive tablet worked straight out the box no hangups out issues with the device. The only thing I see wrong it that there a 1/5 delay between tapping an ap and the opening of the app other then that its perfect

Reviews.Title: HP SLATE 2800 7-INCH 8 GB TABLET ( OLD VERVSION )
Reviews.Author: BUGG'S BUNNY
Reviews.Content: I GAVE THIS TABLET TO MY WIFE FOR A CHRISTMAS GIFT AND WHEN WE WENT TO HOOK IT THE INTERNET WE JUST HAD A HARD TIME TO GET IT TO CONNECT TO THE WIRELESS INTERNET THAT WE HAVE. AND SINCE YOU CAN'T DOWNLOAD ADOBE READER ONTO CHROME ANYMORE WE HAD TO DOWNLOAD FIREFOX ONTO THE TABLET INSTEAD. BUT CHROME IS STILL ON THERE FOR OTHER THINGS..BUT TO PLAY GAMES ON FACEBOOK YES YOU CAN GO ONTO FACEBOOK THROUGH CHROME BUT ONLY AS A GUEST OR SIGN UP TO FACEBOOK AGAIN. BUT NOW WE HAVE IT RUNNING THE WAY WE WANT IT AND MY WIFE  LIKES IT NOW. EXCEPT THE FACT THAT WE HAD TO DOWNLOAD FIREFOX TO CONNECT TO FACEBOOK. THE FACEBOOK ACCOUNT SHE HAD BEFORE ( CHROME WILL NOT DOWNLOAD ADOBE READER ANYMORE). SO YOU HAVE TO DOWNLOAD FIREFOX INSTEAD TO PLAY YOUR GAMES WITHOUT SIGNING UP TO FACEBOOK AGAIN. BUT OTHER THEN THAT IT WORKS FINE THE WAY WE ( SHE ) WANTS  IT TO WORK. SHE PLAY'S ON  IT A LOT WHEN SHES HOME SHE JUST PLAYS GAMES ON IT AND THAT'S WHAT SHE WANTED THE TABLET FOR.. BUT FOR ME IF IT WAS MINE I WOULD WANT MORE THEN ( 8 GB'S )  AND A FASTER RAM AND A BIGGER SCREEN FOR ABOUT THE SAME PRICE RANGE AS WHAT I PAID FOR THE SLATE 7 INCH. ( OLD VERSION ) I WOULD WANT A 10" OR 12" TABLET BUT I DO A LOT MORE THAN SHE DOES SHE JUST PLAYS GAMES AND A FEW OTHER THINGS. I'M ON THE INTERNET A LOT MORE AND I DON'T PLAY GAMES VERY OFTEN BUT THATS WHAT I WOULD WANT THE TABLET FOR. BUT THEN AGAIN THAT'S JUST ME.BUT MY WIFE IS HAPPY WITH THE TABLET AND THAT'S WHAT I WANTED FOR HER TO BE HAPPY WITH THE TABLET.TO BE ABLE TO GO A THE INTERNET WHEN SHE WANTS TO TO LOOK UP WHAT EVER SHE WANTS TO LOOK UP.

Reviews.Title: �
Reviews.Author: Denise Hulten
Reviews.Content: Got this for my 7y for Xmas to play his games like Angry bird,candy, but we did set it up and so far so good now it wrapped up for Santa gift �
